item.title: Library tsfresh that automatically extracts features from time series data
item.description: On the 5th day of [Ateam Lifestyle Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/ateam-lifestyle), Ateam Lifestyle Co., Ltd. CTO Office Engineer Kobayashi is in charge. The company is working on a machine learning project. #Introduction Recently, I have been working on time series data at work, and a convenient library called tsfresh that automatically extracts features from time series data. It was introduced because I used. The order of time-series data has meaning, but since the meaning of the order was not well defined, the background was that we investigated the feature extraction method.
